listing.listing_description:
The peaks of the Twelve Apostles are a beautifully rugged contrast to the clean lines of this contemporary villa overlooking Camps Bay. A Jacuzzi bubbles on the terrace, and oversized windows frame the Lion’s Head silhouette. Fresh grilled seafood and local wine pairings are a 2-minute drive away in downtown Camps Bay, or you can go right to the source: the Constantia wine farms, 20 minutes away. 

Your holiday at this luxury Cape Town property includes the services of a cook, housekeeper and manager who live on-site; it might also include some affection from the huskies who live at the villa. Listen to the waves from a heated pool, hot tub, al-fresco seating around the firepit, or over dinner from the barbecue, and when you’re not watching the light move across the mountains, look to the satellite TV for entertainment. 

Smooth marble and slide-away glass lend a sleek feel to the villa’s open-concept great room. A blue area rug echoes the color of the ocean outside in the sitting area, and the beanbag is a playful touch. There’s plenty of seating for friends and family at a dining table for 12 and along the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen. 

This vacation rental has 3 bedrooms with private en-suite bathrooms: a master bedroom with a king bed, and 2 bedrooms with queen beds. There are also 2 bedrooms that share access to a hall bathroom: one with a king bed and one with a queen bed. All 5 bedrooms have ocean views. 

Montana del Mar is a 3-minute drive from some of the must-sees of South Africa scenery: Lion’s Head, the Table Mountain cable car, and Signal Hill. For a day at the beach followed by a casual meal or honeymoon-worthy prix fixe, make the 2-minute trip to trendy Camps Bay. And don’t miss the popular V&A Waterfront, a 15-minute drive from the villa. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
A peaceful luxury rental within the De Hoop Nature Reserve, this villa offers cutting-edge contemporary style in a commanding location. Alone in a green Fynbos landscape, the home’s firepit patio and ocean-oriented windows provide fine sea views, with tasteful dining room, huge bedrooms, and a heated pool. Beach walks, nature activities and historic Swellendam are all local options.

Getting to Morukuru Beach Lodge is easy with a swift helicopter transfer from Cape Town International Airport, or via scenic self-driven or chauffeur-driven transfer via the scenic Garden route. Set in a unique heathland ecosystem that stretches to the east of the Cape, the home offers a special range of outings and experiences. Dive into the action with guided 4x4 drives through the striking fynbos biosystem, sand boarding on sunlit beaches, or snorkeling in stunning blue ocean water. Relaxed activities like guided marine walks through the park and land-based whale watching (July to October) are also popular options.

The wild heritage of the park is yours to discover from Morukuru Beach Lodge. The dynamic region is home to a huge range of flora and fauna, including seals, antelope, dolphins, wandering sharks and hundreds of species of African plants. Huge beaches and coastal trails are ideal for mountain biking and spotting wildlife, with local guides standing by. Guests can also make the short trip to the colonial-era town of Swellendam, replete with Cape Dutch architecture, rugged mountain vistas, and fine dining establishments serving gourmet takes on classic South African dishes.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Take a stylish holiday to one of the most exclusive areas of the Costa del Sol at Villa Bara. This luxury property is tucked away amid lush gardens in the coveted Nueva Andalucia neighborhood just a 5-minute drive from Marbella. More than 10,000 square feet of space and seven bedrooms, including three in a guest house, make this an ideal retreat for up to fourteen friends or family members.

From the fountain at its entrance to its tree-lined garden, this vacation rental creates a serene ambience from the start. Relax under the Mediterranean sun in outdoor living areas with a swimming pool, loungers and a barbecue, or savor the shade of the al-fresco dining area. Inside, the villa has high-tech features such as a television, Wi-Fi and an alarm system.

The inviting yet elegant feel continues inside Villa Bara, where modern furnishings and artwork fill sunny, spacious rooms. Black and red seating around the fireplace gives a lounge-like vibe to the living room, and the formal dining room seats twelve. There is a fully equipped kitchen in the main house, as well as a second kitchen and living room in the guest house.

There are four bedrooms in the villa’s main house, all with private en-suite bathrooms, and three in the guest house. In the main house, you’ll find one master suite with a king bed and balcony, and three bedrooms with queen beds. The guest house has one bedroom with a queen bed and en-suite bathroom, and two bedrooms with queen beds that share a bathroom.

Though it feels like your own quiet haven in the sun, Villa Bara is just a short drive from the best of the Costa del Sol. Make the 5-minute trip into Marbella for a stroll through the historic city center or an evening out in the clubs, or the short drive to Puerto Banus for an afternoon on the beach or a honeymoon-worthy dinner at a gourmet restaurant. Avid golfers will appreciate having two courses nearby, too.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Take a walk on the wild side at this simply sophisticated escape. Every design element (from stripped wood to exposed stone) has taken cues from nature, including Scandi-style architecture that softly blends into its verdant surroundings. Whether you’re looking for family time, romance, or relaxation, this luxury lodge brings you closer to fauna and flora with a variety of exhilarating excursions.

At sunrise, hop in a safari vehicle and head out for the first game drive of the day. You’ll have the chance to find some of the reserve’s most fascinating wildlife—just make sure you have your camera ready. A hot beverage and the opportunity to sit back, sip, and admire your serene surroundings is part of the tour. After breakfast, guided bush walks allow you to submerge yourself in the wilderness. How many of the Big 5 (lions, elephants, buffalos, leopards, and rhinos) can you spot? For seasoned hikers, more challenging trails are available to explore. End the day with a scenic cruise along the Matlabas River where you can catch a glimpse of hippos, crocodiles, and a variety of bird species drinking from the water’s edge.

Soaring windows feature panoramic savanna views beyond the tranquil terrace. Venture over to the shared infinity edge rock pool which seemingly melts into the Waterfall Valley below. Located in the mountains, a steep walk to each room allows you to appreciate the magnificent view below you. Glowing lanterns illuminate the path to the outdoor fire pit, encompassed by plump patio seating. A chilled glass of house wine perfectly pairs with a night of stargazing. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
A pool and pond reflect fan-like palm fronds and blush-warm walls in their stillness at this oasis-like estate in quiet La Palmeraie. The villa delivers on a grand scale, with more than 16,000 square feet of space, butler service, and daily housekeeping, but also in smaller touches, like heated floors. In 15 minutes you can be sampling dates and sipping mint tea at the souks in central Marrakech.

Lush gardens surround this vacation rental for a secluded, private feel. Start a holiday morning off slowly over a coffee in the alfresco sitting area, then shift to a lounger in the sun or directly to the swimming pool. Serve lunch from the barbecue at the outdoor dining table, and in the evenings, serve drinks from the indoor wet bar or gather friends and family around the satellite TV and Sonos sound system in the entertainment room.

The villa is named for the word for “welcome” in Morocco, and it delivers with touches of comfortable luxury: warm-hued walls, soft rugs covering polished marble floors, and knit poufs in the multiple sitting rooms. The dining area has space for 14, and there’s even more room at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.

There are 5 bedrooms in the villa’s main house and 1 in a separate pool house; all 6 have king beds, ensuite bathrooms, and air conditioning. The main-house master suite is a honeymoon-worthy retreat with its own lounge area, fireplace, and balcony.

A stay at this villa means you’re a 15-minute drive from central Marrakech—close enough to pop in for the day to explore the World Heritage–designated Djemaa el Fna, find a favorite stall in souks selling everything from dried fruit to leather purses, or take a contemplative stroll through the Menara and Majorelle gardens.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
See a different side of Marrakech only minutes from the medina at Dar Sayang. Set along the Route Amizmiz, this architectural gem is an oasis of contemporary design and luxury amenities in the countryside. Invite up to ten friends or family members for a relaxed holiday at this idyllic retreat.

Your stay at Dar Sayang begins with an airport transfer and includes the services of a cook, housekeeper and round-the-clock security. Spend your time lounging in the sun by the pool, catching up on reading, listening to a favorite album on the sound system or simply taking in the views of the snow-capped Atlas Mountains, or challenge the group to games on the lawn or a volley on the private tennis court. Inside, you'll find amenities from massage and exercise rooms to a sauna, ping-pong table, TV, sound system and Wi-Fi.

Designed by the acclaimed Algerian architect Imaad Rahmouni, this incredible residence is both supremely chic and wonderfully comfortable. Floor-to-ceiling windows flood the open-concept living spaces with light, and the easy flow from the sitting area to the dining area adds to the breezy feel. Though your stay does include the services of a cook, the villa has a fully equipped kitchen.

Continue your honeymoon from the everyday in the villa's five bedrooms, all of which have king beds and en-suite bathrooms, and open to a terrace or balcony. Linger outside into the evening around the communal outdoor fireplace, or retreat to the fireplaces in four of the five suites.

With golf, horseback riding and the city just minutes away, Dar Sayang is the perfect vacation rental for the active and the adventurous. Book tee times at one-or all-of the four golf courses within a short walk or drive, or set off from the Royal Equestrian Club. It's well worth taking an afternoon to explore the museums, souks and architecture of Marrakech, but at the very least, sit down to dinner at one of its renowned restaurants.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Plan a holiday in the sun at the aptly named Brightside. Watch the light move across the ocean or the mountains of Cape Town from this luxury property nestled into a hillside near Camps Bay. With five bedrooms, plenty of room for outdoor entertaining and a location close to the beach, it’s the perfect destination for a relaxed getaway with up to ten friends or a warm-weather vacation with family.

A slide-away glass wall separates the villa’s living spaces from a gorgeous terrace with a swimming pool and al-fresco dining table overlooking the ocean. Or step out the back door and into a private yard in the shadow of the 12 Apostles, where kids can play and grown-ups can stretch out for a nap. Other amenities range from a TV, Wi-Fi and sound system to laundry facilities and air conditioning.

On the indoor side of the glass wall is a stunning open-concept great room with two sitting areas, a generous dining table and a fully equipped kitchen with a sleek breakfast bar. A chic monochromatic white color scheme is punctuated by a colorful area rug and vibrant artwork, and the space is warmed up by an inviting fireplace.

Brightside has one master bedroom with a king bed and en-suite bathroom, two bedrooms with queen beds and en-suite bathrooms, and two bedrooms with queen beds that share a hall bathroom. All five bedrooms at this vacation rental have air conditioning.

Though the villa is set on a tranquil residential side street in Camps Bay, it’s just a short drive from the iconic silhouette of Lion’s Head and the fascinating World of Birds Wildlife Sanctuary and Monkey Park. Tee off at the nearby King David Mowbray golf club or join locals and honeymooners alike on the beaches of Clifton and Camps Bay.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Olive, palm, and pine trees nestle close to this newly built villa on Crete, making it feel like a rocky outcropping in the landscape. It’s built into the hillside and spills over the slope, with the pool and alfresco living areas stretching down toward the sea. Make like a local and follow a path to a small rocky beach or walk to the restaurant in the village of Likotinara.

Soak in the sunshine from a lounger by the heated infinity pool or savor the shade of a pergola-covered outdoor sitting area. Just down the hill, a stone barbecue makes quick work of dinner, and alfresco living and dining areas tucked into the scenery invite you to linger outside over a bottle of Greek wine or around a firepit.

Glass walls on 3 sides make the living room feel like an extension of the terrace, and a pair of plush blue-green sofas is just as welcoming as the loungers outside. Follow a hallway bordered by floor-to-ceiling glass to the open-concept dining area and fully equipped kitchen, where azure cabinets evoke the color of the sea.

The villa’s location in the hamlet of Likotinara means you’re close to a local-favourite rocky beach and just over 2 km from the nearest taverna. Drive to nearby villages for restaurants and markets, and make the 9-kilometer trip to the island’s longest sandy beach. In 20 minutes you can be on the national road headed for the city of Chania.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Relish the lush serenity of a private oasis in this exquisite Moroccan villa near Marrakech. Nestled amid expansive gardens, olive groves, and stately palms yielding to Atlas Mountain vistas, the villa's alfresco living spaces set an enchanting stage for special events, or intimate gatherings with loved ones. Situated along the prestigious Route d'Ouarzazate, Villa Akkin is an easy drive from the splendors of central Marrakech and some of the country's finest golf courses.

listing.listing_description:
Mango Villas is a luxury development of two spacious independent villas. Situated in a four acre piece of land in an olive grove with more than 100 olive trees, they overlook the delightful Loutraki Bay with a lovely view of the spectacular White Mountains as a colorful contrast.

Mango Villas are ideal for family vacations with plenty to keep children of all ages entertained inside and outside. There’s a games console, Wi-Fi access, DVD player, home theater system and satellite television. Equipped as it is for the digital age, it would be impossible to ignore what’s on offer outside the property; a swimming pool, sunbeds, hot tub, terrace with lounge area and garden are the main highlights. Daily housekeeping is included in the cost of your stay as well as a personal concierge and 24 hour guest support, so all you need to do is focus on having the best vacation of your life in charming Chania.

The villas are an architectural delight featuring airy rooms and large windows. The pastel interiors combine simple elegance and beautiful design with comfort and luxury. Here, you will renew your spirit and realize that the environment offers you the perfect time, every time.

There are three bedrooms split over two levels. On the first level, you’ll find the master bedroom complete with its king size bed, en-suite bathroom and television. The lower level houses the remaining two bedrooms which have double beds that can be converted into singles depending on your needs. Both bedrooms on the lower floor are also en-suite. There’s also a baby cot available in the villas if you need one.

Mango Villas are located only a short walk from the sandy, shallow beach of Loutraki. Swimming can be enjoyed in the crystal clear turquoise waters within a lovely sheltered bay. The beach of Loutraki offers sun beds and parasols, a small café for simple lunches, and a restaurant with authentic Cretan cuisine. Approximately 1 km north along the coast is the beautiful beach of Marathi offering several good restaurants and a beach-café. Since the villas are only 9 km from Chania International Airport (CHQ), you’ll be able to start your vacation quickly after touching down on Cretan soil.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All Rights Reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Designed to celebrate the Palmeraie’s gorgeous natural surroundings, Villa Alkhozama is constructed from local building materials in traditional Moroccan style. Seamlessly merging indoor and outdoor spaces makes this luxurious, open-air home the perfect host for a retreat or honeymoon, with an emphasis on privacy throughout the entire estate. And, although Alkhozama’s expertly manicured gardens deliver such seclusion, you’ll still be located just a short, chauffeured, drive from Marrakech.

The brilliant colors of Morocco are on display within Alkhozama’s walls, with interior decoration provided by authentic local handcrafted art, and treasures found at the Souks. Inside, comfortable furniture, high-end electronics, and traditional Moroccan building materials are interwoven to create a luxurious take on ancient design. Each bedroom features a queen-sized bed and an en-suite bathroom. The master has an additional outdoor area with sun beds, creating an alfresco bedroom setting, should you wish. Outside, there is an electronic gate and several security cameras. And, the villa is equipped with television, Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and a washer/dryer.

Villa Alkhozama is staffed with housekeepers, private cooks, a chauffeur, and a spa technician, all to help make your getaway as relaxing and rejuvenating as possible. The terrace features a swimming pool, alfresco shower, lounge chairs, and day beds throughout its lush garden environment. Inside, let the formal dining room and wood burning fireplace set the tone for a romantic dinner. After, pick a bottle of wine from the kitchen and head to the terrace to enjoy an unforgettable night under the stars.

La Palmeraie is a beautiful oasis on the outskirts of the city, decorated with ancient mosques, palm trees, luxury villas, and the Palmeraie Golf Club. It’s easy to get around Palmeraie by car, but an ATV or Camel tour can be much more rewarding. To learn about Morocco’s rich historical significance, spend an afternoon exploring the Dar Si Said Museum. And, when you’re ready, head for the Medina and embrace the bustling downtown square and bazaars of Marrakech’s historic district. You’ll find street performers, shops, delicious food, and much more in the Medina.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Expansive city and mountain views are yours at Hildene Haven. Nestled in the shadow of Lion’s Head in the Tamboerskloof area, this beautifully designed vacation rental offers plenty of space to contemplate the vistas. If you’re keen to explore Cape Town, it’s just a short drive from the city center, popular beaches and the V&A Waterfront.

Start the day with a practice in the yoga room or a cup from the espresso machine. Watch the sunlight or clouds move across the mountains from private outdoor living areas with a heated swimming pool, lounging and dining areas, and a charcoal barbecue. In the evenings, unwind by the TV and fireplace or catch up on emails via Wi-Fi.

The views are just as exquisite inside as out thanks to floor-to-ceiling glass windows that wrap around the open-concept great room. Sleek modern furnishings in the sitting area keep the focus on the spectacular landscape, and the dining area shows mid-century-modern inspiration in its seating for eight. There’s also a breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.

This luxury property has two bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, and two bedrooms with a king and queen bed, respectively, that share a bathroom. The four bedrooms can accommodate groups of up to eight friends or family members on holiday together—or could be reserved for a honeymoon spent exploring the city and sampling South African wines.

Though it’s tucked away on a quiet residential street, Hildene Haven is within easy reach of central Cape Town and must-sees like Lion’s Head and the V&A Waterfront. Spend a day out with the locals at Camps Bay Beach or Clifton Beach and splash in the waves yourself or just watch the water-sports enthusiasts take on the surf from a spot on the sand.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Colonial charm meets contemporary chic at this farmhouse-inspired retreat nestled into the Afromontane Forest on South Africa’s Kwandwe Private Game Reserve. This fully staffed villa pairs classic details like wood floors and a stone fireplace with a modern open-plan layout and central pool courtyard. It’s all a daily scheduled flight or 105-minute drive from Port Elizabeth.

As the largest private reserve in South Africa, Kwandwe is teeming with the Big 5, and offers guests plenty of opportunities to spot them. Set off on an open-vehicle safari through 22,000 malaria-free hectares, take a guided walking safari, spark kids interest on a children’s safari, and try your luck fishing on Galpin Dam.

There are day and night drives, so you’ll see a range of wildlife, and you can ask a photography or birdwatching expert to accompany if you’re keen to get great shots or catch one of the 315 bird species found on the reserve. And there are meals to go with the drives. Watch first light spread over the landscape on a bush breakfast and see the stars come out over sunset drinks and alfresco dinners.

Tailor a stay to your family by adding experiences like a rhino monitoring drive or a rhino conservation safari, where you can help dart and notch rhinos under the guidance of Kwandwe’s experts. Learn to braai like the locals on a campfire cooking class with one of the reserve chefs and finish a day of trekking with the indulgence of an in-villa massage.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Perched on the coastal hillside of Llandudno, one of Cape Town’s most prestigious communities, Soul offers extremely luxurious amenities and an ocean view that can’t be beaten. This contemporary villa comes with six en-suite bedrooms, all of which features either ocean or garden views and their own private outdoor areas. With beach, golf, hiking, and nightlife within a short drive, you’ll be able to appreciate Soul’s private atmosphere without sacrificing proximity to all of Cape Town’s incredible attractions.

Soul has the perfect environment for family vacations or couples retreats, as there are many spacious areas, ideal for group gatherings, as well as numerous spots to break away for more intimate moments. The open concept floor plan and a massive amount of ocean view-framing windows and doorways ensure that Cape Town’s natural environment is welcomed into the home, providing the perfect contrast to the modern-contemporary furniture and state of the art electronics. During your stay, you’ll surely appreciate the villa’s formal and alfresco dining options, heartwarming fireplace, media room, and luxuriously outfitted en-suite bedrooms.

Outside, the ocean-view terrace is the perfect place to relax and unwind. You’ll love spending afternoons lounging by the pool or working on your tan, down on the lawn. The terrace offers many more furnished lounge spaces as well, so there’s always somewhere new to curl up with a good book or enjoy a cocktail with friends and loved ones.

The nearest sandy spot for a swim is Llandudno, just down the hill, about two minutes by car. Travel a little farther, and you can visit Clifton and Camps Bay, two of Cape Town’s most popular beachfront areas. If there’s a golfer in your entourage, Royal Cape Golf Club is an incredibly scenic course with imposing mountain views from every hole. If you’ve still got some energy to burn after a morning on the course, consider a hike up Lion’s Head. After the ninety-minute journey up the iconic mountain, you’ll be rewarded with the best view in the country.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Contemporary and innovative, Waterline takes Cape Town living to a new level. Designed as a minimalist yet comfortable retreat just outside the city center, this luxury property is also completely self-reliant for its water supply. Choose this stunning vacation rental for an eco-friendly holiday with up to ten friends and family members.

Savor the views of sea, mountains and vineyards from two gorgeous terraces with an infinity pool, lounging and dining areas, and both propane and charcoal barbecues. Entertain outdoors with a classic braai, then relax indoors in the media room and library around the TV, Wi-Fi and wood-burning fireplace.

The living spaces at Waterline range from the expansive and open-plan to the cozy and intimate—but all of them stylishly and thoughtfully appointed. A top-floor great room with a spacious living area, dining area for twelve, and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar is adjoined by a more private TV lounge. Downstairs, you’ll find another living room and a library stocked with a wide-ranging collection of books and modernist lounge chairs.

The villa has two bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms—one with a king bed and one with a queen bed—and two bedrooms that have access to two private bathroom—one with a double bed and one with two twin beds. All four bedrooms feature alfresco showers, spa-worthy touches such as heated towel racks and underfloor heating, and open to a shared terrace.

Both the wonders of nature and the excitement of the city are close at hand at Waterline. The villa is a 5-minute walk from beautiful Noordhoek Beach, where you can examine a shipwreck, and a short drive from exclusive Llandudno Beach, perfect for a honeymoon-style stroll along the sand. Be sure to leave time for a visit to nearby Boulders Penguin Colony and iconic Table Mountain.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Gently rolling hills stretch to the horizon around this modern safari lodge in South Africa’s Kwandwe Private Game Reserve. Set on a rise overlooking a watering hole for wildlife, this fully staffed villa lets you watch wildlife from your own watering hole (the swimming pool) or dine out in the boma. While it feels remote, it’s a short flight or 105-minute drive from Port Elizabeth.

Start the day with breakfast in the bush, then set off on a game drive included in your stay, where you can spot the Big 5 along with a range of bird species. Open vehicles mean there aren’t any windows between you and the animals, and Kwandwe is both the largest private reserve in South Africa and malaria free. If you’re keen to get some photos or spot a particular bird, ask about having one of the reserve’s photographic or birdwatching experts accompany your drive.

You can also take a guided walking safari, send the kids off on children’s activities, and ask about volunteering at the Mgcamabele Community Centre before finishing the day with sunset drinks and an alfresco dinner.

Tailor your stay by adding experiences such as a rhino monitoring drive or rhino conservation safari, where you’ll get the chance to track rhinos under the guidance of Kwandwe’s experts. Learn how to braai like a South African during a campfire cooking class with one of the reserve chefs, and treat yourself with an in-villa manicure or massage.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Anassa is an outstanding luxury villa in the high-end enclave of Clifton, just south of Cape Town. Perfectly situated just minutes from Clifton Beach and Camps Bay, the villa enjoys extraordinary sunset views of the Atlantic Ocean and the Twelve Apostles Mountain Range. Stunning alfresco living spaces including a lovely plunge pool, along with superb interior living areas and four deluxe bedroom suites, provide an ideal setting for families and groups of friends. Your vacation rental includes housekeeping, and concierge.

Perched on a highland slope overlooking the Western Cape coastline and sea, the tri-level home enjoys breathtaking views from its ample terrace and upper-level balconies. Enjoy enchanting days by the gem-toned plunge pool, savoring the ocean breeze and exquisite sunlight on elegant loungers. In the afternoon, cook a barbeque lunch and relish it alfresco; and at sunset, drink delicious South African wine in the outdoor lounge while gazing on the dreamy horizon.

The pool terrace joins the interior living room through ample glass doors, allowing the home to breathe the Atlantic air. A lovely, two-way fireplace warms the cozy lounge area and the ocean-view dining table, while the luminous kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and an espresso machine. There is also a separate media room with cozy furnishings and large TV. Throughtout the home, the understated elegance of the design and décor provides stylish luxury while harmonizing with this mountainous coastline's exquisite natural beauty.

The villa features three bedrooms with king beds and one with a queen, accommodating eight guests in all. Three of the four bedrooms open to balconies, and all have ensuite bathrooms with stand-alone showers and tubs. The fabulous master suite enjoys corner views of the ocean through ample windows.

Anassa enjoys a spectacular location within these renowned suburbs on the Cape Peninsula's sunset coast. With Cape Town's world-class art and dining just fifteen minutes away, you're also an easy drive to the iconic and gorgeous Twelve Apostles Mountains, including neaerby Lion's Head, while two-world class beaches and their adjioning towns—Camps Bay and Clifton—are just over five minutes from your garage. Complimentary airport transfer makes Anassa a convenient choice for destination wedding guests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Marbella, known as a playground for the rich and famous, is justifiably one of the most beautiful areas on the planet. A host to numerous arts and culture festivals, World Tennis Association tournaments, and luxury yachts, Marbella earns its accolades year after year. And, just minutes away in the rolling hills of the Costa del Sol, Casa San Bernardo’s six bedroom estate is waiting to host your next luxurious vacation.

Designed in the elegant Spanish Colonial style, Bernardo is a private oasis, loaded with luxurious modern features and old world charm. Columns support the arched overhang above the covered section of the terrace. Grand living spaces with numerous openings to the outdoors allow guests and fresh air to flow seamlessly throughout. And, wrought iron fixtures, intricate crown moulding, and terracotta floor tiles complete Bernardo’s classic Spanish atmosphere. The kitchen is a little more modern than the rest of the house, with stainless steel appliances and stylish cabinetry, it’s sure to inspire your inner chef.

Outside, amongst the beautifully landscaped gardens, you’ll find panoramic views of this picturesque gated community of the Costa del Sol countryside. Sun loungers, alfresco dining, and outdoor living spaces provide several unique vantage points and social settings for guests to enjoy. On a hot afternoon, nothing beats a dip in the swimming pool. And at night, count the stars while you enjoy a glass of wine and a soak in the hot tub.

Head about ten minutes south-east towards the coast and you’ll find yourself in the heart of Marbella. Make sure to bring a camera because Marbella is home to some of the most breathtaking architecture on the planet. There are also several museums, monuments, and historical sites throughout the downtown core. For quick and easy beach access, Playa Puerto Banus is ten kilometres from Bernardo’s estate. There you’ll find crystal clear water protected by a calming cove and fine white sand.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
